EmailTemplate.subject: Exclusive Invitation - Join us in Singapore for the First Asia Pacific Pivotal Summit Oct 23-24
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Asia Pacific Pivotal Summit 2013 Register Now. Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Enterprises are being driven to compete, innovate and execute faster than ever before, at a time when we’re witnessing the most disruptive platform shifts and advances in technology in over 30 years.
Forward thinking organizations want to leverage new data sources by rapidly building modern applications, optimizing existing infrastructures and gaining insights in real-time. However, they are frustrated by high costs, un-scalable bloated architectures and non-agile practices.
Join us at the first Asia Pacific Pivotal Summit 2013 <http://www.pivotalsummit.shobiziems.com/register.php> to learn how to overcome these challenges, so your organization can win with applications, data and analytics. To learn more about the Summit, visit our event website <http://www.pivotalsummit.shobiziems.com>.
Over the 2-day event you will:
- Gain strategic knowledge into how enterprises are using Big Data to make them run better and faster. - Discover how using predictive analytics and data science can give a competitive edge. - Learn about Pivotal One, a next-generation enterprise Platform as a Service (PaaS). - Connect with the wider data, analytics and application community. - Have an opportunity to join us for a full day of informative technology workshops.
<http://www.pivotalsummit.shobiziems.com/register.php> <http://www.pivotalsummit.shobiziems.com/register.php>
Day 1: October 23, 2013 Location: W Hotel Sentosa Cove <http://www.starwoodhotels.com/whotels/property/overview/index.html?propertyID=3462>
Day 2: October 24, 2013 Location: Resort World Sentosa <http://www.rwsentosa.com/>
Our line-up for this exclusive summit includes Pivotal CEO Paul Maritz, sharing his vision and mission for Pivotal – a company built for next generation technology. He will be joined by his team of senior industry experts and key customers demonstrating how they derive business insights from data.
This highly anticipated, invitation-only event has limited places, so register today <http://www.pivotalsummit.shobiziems.com/register.php>.
